accountCreation.title: Create Your CyberEco Account
accountCreation.subtitle: Join the ecosystem in minutes with our step-by-step guide
accountCreation.goal: Set up your account with optimal security and privacy settings
accountCreation.learn1: Create a secure CyberEco Hub account
accountCreation.step1Desc: Visit hub.cybere.co and click 'Sign Up' to begin creating your account. The Hub is your central identity across all CyberEco applications.
accountCreation.step1Tip: Pro Tip: Bookmark hub.cybere.co for easy access to all your CyberEco apps
accountCreation.step2Desc: Choose a strong password that you don't use elsewhere. We recommend using a password manager for maximum security.
accountCreation.step3Desc: Add a display name and optional profile photo. This helps others recognize you across CyberEco applications.
accountCreation.displayNameDesc: How you'll appear to others (can be changed later)
accountCreation.profilePhotoDesc: Helps others recognize you in groups and shared activities
accountCreation.step4Desc: Add an extra layer of security to your account. We support authenticator apps, SMS, and hardware keys.
accountCreation.authenticatorDesc: Most secure option using apps like Google Authenticator or Authy
accountCreation.smsDesc: Receive codes via text message to your phone
accountCreation.hardwareDesc: Physical security keys like YubiKey for maximum security
accountCreation.step5Desc: Configure your default privacy settings. You can always adjust these later for specific applications or sharing scenarios.
accountCreation.profileVisibilityDesc: Who can see your basic profile information and activity across apps
accountCreation.activitySharingDesc: How your activity in apps (like expenses or events) is shared with others
accountCreation.dataCollectionDesc: What usage data we collect to improve apps (always anonymized)
accountCreation.step6Desc: Check your email for a verification message. Click the verification link to activate your account and enable all features.
accountCreation.verificationText: Some features like password reset and security notifications require a verified email address.
accountCreation.exploreJustSplitDesc: Start sharing expenses with friends and family using our most popular app.
accountCreation.securityDeepDiveDesc: Learn about advanced security features and privacy controls for your account.
accountCreation.joinCommunityDesc: Connect with other users and help shape the platform's future.
accountCreation.supportText: If you encounter any issues during setup, our support team is here to help.

justSplitGuide.title: JustSplit User Guide
justSplitGuide.goalText: Master expense sharing and group management
justSplitGuide.introText: JustSplit makes sharing expenses with friends, family, and colleagues simple and transparent. This comprehensive guide covers everything from basic expense splitting to advanced group management, receipt scanning, and settlement tracking.
justSplitGuide.receiptScanningDesc: Scan receipts with your camera and automatically extract expense details
justSplitGuide.multiCurrencyDesc: Handle expenses in 150+ currencies with real-time conversion
justSplitGuide.smartSplittingDesc: Equal, custom, percentage, and shares-based splitting methods
justSplitGuide.chapter1Desc: Learn the basics: creating your first expense, understanding the interface, and navigating the app.
justSplitGuide.topic1_2: Creating your first expense in under 2 minutes
justSplitGuide.example1: Split a $60 dinner bill equally among 3 friends, send notifications, and track who has paid.
justSplitGuide.chapter2Desc: Create and manage groups for different contexts: family, friends, work colleagues, or special events.
justSplitGuide.topic2_1: Creating groups for different scenarios (family, work, travel)
justSplitGuide.topic2_4: Archiving and deleting groups when needed
justSplitGuide.chapter3Desc: Go beyond equal splits with custom amounts, percentages, shares, and complex splitting scenarios.
justSplitGuide.equalSplitDesc: Divide the total amount equally among all participants. Perfect for simple shared meals or utilities.
justSplitGuide.equalSplitUse: Restaurant bills, shared rent, group purchases
justSplitGuide.customSplitDesc: Assign specific dollar amounts to each person. Ideal when people consumed different amounts.
justSplitGuide.customSplitUse: Different meal costs, varying participation levels
justSplitGuide.percentageSplitDesc: Assign percentages that total 100%. Great for income-based sharing or proportional splits.
justSplitGuide.sharesSplitDesc: Assign relative shares (e.g., 1 share, 2 shares). Perfect for different consumption levels.
justSplitGuide.chapter4Desc: Speed up expense entry with intelligent receipt scanning and learn best practices for accurate data capture.
justSplitGuide.tip1: Ensure good lighting and hold camera steady
justSplitGuide.tip2: Keep receipt flat and fully visible in frame
justSplitGuide.tip3: Clean camera lens for sharper image quality
justSplitGuide.tip4: Use dark background to improve text contrast
justSplitGuide.chapter5Desc: Track who owes what, manage settlements, and integrate with popular payment platforms.
justSplitGuide.digitalPaymentsDesc: Venmo, PayPal, Zelle, Cash App, Apple Pay
justSplitGuide.bankTransferDesc: Direct bank-to-bank payments and wire transfers
justSplitGuide.cashDesc: In-person cash payments with mutual confirmation
justSplitGuide.settlementStep2: Choose payment method and add reference
justSplitGuide.settlementStep3: Mark as paid - other party receives notification
justSplitGuide.settlementStep4: Both parties confirm - expense marked as settled
justSplitGuide.action1: Add new expense: + button in bottom right
justSplitGuide.action2: Scan receipt: Camera icon when adding expense
justSplitGuide.action3: Edit expense: Tap expense → Edit button
justSplitGuide.action4: Mark as paid: Expense details → Settle
justSplitGuide.trouble1: Receipt won't scan: Check lighting and focus
justSplitGuide.trouble2: Notifications not working: Check app permissions
justSplitGuide.trouble3: Wrong currency: Edit in expense settings
justSplitGuide.trouble5: Missing data: Pull down to refresh
justSplitGuide.privacyGuideDesc: Master privacy controls and advanced security features for your expenses.
justSplitGuide.groupManagementDesc: Learn advanced techniques for managing large groups and complex scenarios.
justSplitGuide.dataExportDesc: Export your data and analyze spending patterns with detailed reports.

mobileAppGuide.title: Mobile App Guide
mobileAppGuide.introText: CyberEco applications are designed mobile-first for on-the-go expense tracking, group management, and real-time collaboration. This guide covers mobile-specific features, offline capabilities, and tips for optimal mobile usage.
mobileAppGuide.pwaDesc: Works on any mobile browser with app-like experience
mobileAppGuide.receiptScanningDesc: Point your camera at any receipt and automatically extract expense details, amounts, and participants.
mobileAppGuide.scanTip2: Ensure good lighting and flat receipt
mobileAppGuide.scanTip3: Tap to focus if image is blurry
mobileAppGuide.locationBasedDesc: Automatically suggests expense categories and participants based on your location and past spending patterns.
mobileAppGuide.locationTip3: Privacy-first: location data stays on device
mobileAppGuide.quickActionsDesc: Access common actions with swipe gestures, force touch, and one-tap shortcuts for faster expense entry.
mobileAppGuide.smartNotificationsDesc: Intelligent notifications that learn your preferences and only alert you about important expense updates.
mobileAppGuide.localStorageDesc: All your recent data is stored locally for instant access even without internet connection.
mobileAppGuide.offlineEntryDesc: Create and edit expenses while offline. Changes sync automatically when you reconnect.
mobileAppGuide.autoSyncDesc: Seamless synchronization when connection is restored. No data loss, ever.
mobileAppGuide.backgroundAppDesc: Turn off for better battery life, turn on for real-time updates
mobileAppGuide.lowPowerModeDesc: App automatically reduces features to conserve battery
mobileAppGuide.wifiPreferenceDesc: Large uploads (photos) wait for Wi-Fi by default
mobileAppGuide.dataCompressionDesc: Images automatically compressed to save mobile data
mobileAppGuide.scanSolution1: Check camera permissions in phone settings
mobileAppGuide.scanSolution2: Clean camera lens and ensure good lighting
mobileAppGuide.scanSolution3: Try manual entry if receipt is damaged
mobileAppGuide.scanSolution4: Update app for latest scanning improvements
mobileAppGuide.justSplitGuideDesc: Master all JustSplit features including group management and advanced splitting.
mobileAppGuide.privacySettingsDesc: Configure mobile-specific privacy settings and security features.
mobileAppGuide.supportDesc: Contact our mobile app support team for device-specific help.

privacySettingsGuide.title: Privacy & Security Settings
privacySettingsGuide.introText: CyberEco applications are built with privacy as a core principle. This comprehensive guide covers all privacy and security settings across the platform, helping you understand what data is collected, how it's used, and how to configure optimal settings for your needs.
privacySettingsGuide.dataMinimizationDesc: We only collect data necessary for functionality
privacySettingsGuide.endToEndEncryptionDesc: Your sensitive data is encrypted before leaving your device
privacySettingsGuide.userControlDesc: You control what data to share and with whom
privacySettingsGuide.profileVisibilityDesc: Control who can see your profile information across all CyberEco applications.
privacySettingsGuide.friendsOnlyDesc: Only people you've explicitly added as friends can see your profile
privacySettingsGuide.networkOnlyDesc: Friends and friends-of-friends can see limited profile information
privacySettingsGuide.publicDesc: Anyone can see your basic profile information
privacySettingsGuide.activitySharingDesc: Control how your activity across different applications is shared with other users.
privacySettingsGuide.expenseVisibilityDesc: Who can see expenses you're involved in
privacySettingsGuide.paymentStatusDesc: Whether others can see if you've paid your share
privacySettingsGuide.spendingPatternsDesc: Whether to share anonymized spending insights
privacySettingsGuide.votingHistoryDesc: Whether your voting choices are public or private
privacySettingsGuide.proposalActivityDesc: Whether others can see proposals you've created or commented on
privacySettingsGuide.dataCollectionDesc: Control what usage data is collected to improve CyberEco applications.
privacySettingsGuide.usageAnalyticsDesc: How you interact with apps (clicks, time spent, features used)
privacySettingsGuide.errorReportingDesc: Automatic crash reports and error logs to fix bugs faster
privacySettingsGuide.twoFactorAuthDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account with 2FA.
privacySettingsGuide.step1Desc: Select authenticator app, SMS, or hardware key
privacySettingsGuide.step2Desc: Scan QR code or enter setup key
privacySettingsGuide.step3Desc: Store recovery codes in a safe place
privacySettingsGuide.sessionManagementDesc: Monitor and control active sessions across all your devices.
privacySettingsGuide.activeSessionsDesc: See all devices currently logged into your account
privacySettingsGuide.sessionTimeoutDesc: Automatically log out after period of inactivity
privacySettingsGuide.remoteLogoutDesc: Sign out of all devices instantly if needed
privacySettingsGuide.deviceSecurityDesc: Additional security measures for mobile and desktop apps.
privacySettingsGuide.biometricLockDesc: Use fingerprint or face recognition to unlock apps
privacySettingsGuide.appPinLockDesc: Require PIN to access sensitive information
privacySettingsGuide.autoLockDesc: Lock app automatically after specified time
privacySettingsGuide.dataExportDesc: Download a complete copy of all your data in standard formats.
privacySettingsGuide.dataCorrectionDesc: Update or correct any inaccurate personal information in your account.
privacySettingsGuide.dataDeletionDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
privacySettingsGuide.practice1Desc: Create a unique password for your CyberEco account that you don't use anywhere else.
privacySettingsGuide.practice2Desc: Turn on 2FA, biometric locks, and automatic session timeouts for maximum protection.
privacySettingsGuide.practice3Desc: Check your privacy settings every few months and adjust as your needs change.
privacySettingsGuide.practice4Desc: Only share what's necessary for the functionality you need.
privacySettingsGuide.practice5Desc: Use device locks, keep software updated, and don't share devices with untrusted people.
privacySettingsGuide.groupManagementDesc: Learn to manage complex group scenarios and privacy settings for shared expenses.
privacySettingsGuide.dataExportGuideDesc: Master data export features and analyze your spending patterns while maintaining privacy.
privacySettingsGuide.supportDesc: Get help with privacy questions or report data protection concerns.
